articles.title: National Meeting of Workers Active in Geological Prospecting Held
articles.content:
National Meeting of Workers Active in Geological Prospecting Held
 Pyongyang, September 26 (KCNA) -- The National Meeting of Workers Active in Geological Prospecting was held at the People's Palace of Culture on Sunday.
					 The meeting analyzed and reviewed the achievements, experience and lessons made in the struggle to carry out the militant tasks set forth at leader Kim Jong Il's work "Let Us Bring About a New Upsurge in Geological Prospecting" and discussed the issues of carrying through the strategic line advanced at the Seventh Congress of the Workers' Party of Korea on building an economic giant and fulfilling the mission and duty of the officials in the field of geological prospecting as the scout of industry and vanguard in making a breakthrough in socialist economic construction.
					
					 Present at the meeting were Pak Pong Ju, O Su Yong, Choe Pu Il, Ro Tu Chol, No Kwang Chol and vice-premiers of the Cabinet, leading officials of the party, armed forces and power bodies, ministries, national institutions, institutions and industrial establishments in the provinces, cities and countries, model officials and members in the field of geological prospecting across the country.
					
					 "Let Us Accelerate the Building of a Socialist Economic Power by Bringing About a Turn in Geological Prospecting", a letter sent by supreme leader Kim Jong Un to the participants in the National Meeting of Workers Active in Geological Prospecting was conveyed by Pak Pong Ju, member of the Presidium of the Political Bureau of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea and premier of the DPRK Cabinet.
					
					 Kim Jong Un in his letter said that great progress has been made in the past geological prospecting under the deep care and energetic guidance of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il.
					
					 In order to attain the grand goal of building a socialist economic power set forth at the Seventh Congress of the Workers' Party of Korea, it is necessary to bring about a great turn in geological prospecting, he said, stressing that geological prospecting is the scout front of building a socialist economic power.
					
					 He underlined the need to bring about a decisive turn in geological prospecting.
					
					 He went on: It is imperative to set the strategy for development of geological prospecting on a scientific and long-term basis as required by the building of an economic power and implement it stage by stage without fail.
					
					 It is necessary to put geological prospecting on a modern and IT basis by dint of the latest science and technology and modernize prospecting facilities and ensure their local production.
					
					 It is important to establish the discipline and order of developing the underground natural resources under the state's uniform guidance, enhance the responsibility and role of the institutions of protecting and supervising underground natural resources and direct the state's efforts to ensuring material and technological support for geological prospecting.
					
					 He expressed belief that the officials and other working people in the field of geological prospecting across the country would effect a turn in geological prospecting and proactively contribute to building a socialist economic power. 
					
					 Vice-Premier Ri Ryong Nam in a report said that "On Giving Definite Priority to Geological Prospecting", a speech made by Kim Il Sung at the Consultative Meeting of Officials in the Field of Geological Prospecting on May 15, Juche 50 (1961) indicated the principled issues, tasks and ways in the work of geological prospecting.
					
					 He noted that Kim Jong Il made sure that the National Meeting of Geological Prospecting Workers was convened on May 25, Juche 80 (1991) and sent his letter "Let Us Bring About a New Upsurge in Geological Prospecting" to the participants in the meeting.
					
					 He pointed out that the idea and cause of the great leaders on geological prospecting are being successfully carried forward and developed by Kim Jong Un.
					
					 He called for setting the long-term objective and stage-tasks and measures for carrying them out on the basis of the strategy of the Party and the state on economic development, true to the tasks set forth at Kim Jong Un's letter, and surely implementing them by making the greatest use of the existing foundation and potentials.
					
					 At the meeting speakers expressed the will to bring about a new turn in geological prospecting to successfully fulfill the mission as the scout of industry finding out all the underground natural resources of the country and thus exalt before the world the great era of the Workers' Party shining with creation and changes.

articles.title: "Wonsan Air Festival-2016" Held
articles.content:
"Wonsan Air Festival-2016" Held
 Pyongyang, September 26 (KCNA) -- The Wonsan Air Festival-2016 took place in Wonsan City, Kangwon Province.
					 During the festival, colorful sports and cultural events were held. Among them were aeronautics of military and civil planes, home and foreign parachute players and fans' parachute descending skill, remote controlled flight of model planes, sightseeing flight and music and dance performance.
					
					 The festival was opened at Kalma Airport on Saturday.
					
					 Prior to the opening ceremony the participants laid a floral basket before the statues of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il in Wonsan City and paid tribute to them.
					
					 Present at the opening ceremony were First Vice-Chairman Yun Yong Sok and members the preparatory committee of the festival, air sports fans, working people in Wonsan City, David Thomson Rolands, president of the British Juche travel services who doubles as honorary vice-chairman of the preparatory committee of the festival, diplomatic envoys and embassy officials of different countries here and foreign guests.
					
					 Speeches were made.
					
					 At the end of the opening ceremony, there took place flight skills of military and civil planes.
					
					 The flights by fighter pilots of the Korean People's Army excited the spectators.
					
					 The pilots presented flight skills such as horizontal flight, zooming, descending, corkscrew flight, lowest altitude flight and inverted flight while changing the speed at different altitude.
					
					 The flight by girls pilots of supersonic fighters of the Korean People's Army reached the height of aeronautics. 
					
					 The spectators were greatly delighted to watch fighter pilots make special skill flights. 
					
					 Pilots of civil planes admirably presented their skills to add pleasures to the spectators.
					
					 There took place a music and dance performance at the Songdowon Youth Open-air Theatre in the evening.
					
					 Domestic and foreign parachute players and fans' parachute descending skill and remote controlled flight of model planes revved up the atmosphere of the festival on Sunday.
					
					 There took place an evening gala of youth and students to congratulate the successful festival at Haean Square in Wonsan City on Sunday evening.

articles.title: Vice-Chairman of WPK Meets Participants in Int'l Science and Technology Book Fair
articles.content:
Vice-Chairman of WPK Meets Participants in Int'l Science and Technology Book Fair
 Pyongyang, September 26 (KCNA) -- Choe Thae Bok, vice-chairman of the C.C., the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK), on Monday met and had a talk with heads of the delegations and delegates, who are participating in the 10th Pyongyang International Science and Technology Book Fair.

articles.title: Int'l Science and Technology Book Fair Opens
articles.content:
Int'l Science and Technology Book Fair Opens
 Pyongyang, September 26 (KCNA) -- The 10th Pyongyang International Science and Technology Book Fair opened with due ceremony at the Sci-Tech Complex on Monday.
					 On display there are books on the latest science and technology and other materials presented by dozens of bodies from more than 20 countries including the DPRK, Germany, Russia, Singapore, Egypt, Vietnam, Finland, Peru and China, such international bodies as UNESCO, WHO and the Environmental Education Media Project, overseas Koreans' organizations, individual personages and foreign embassies and missions of international bodies here.
					
					 Present at the opening ceremony were Choe Thae Bok, vice-chairman of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, officials concerned, teachers, researchers, delegations and delegates of foreign countries, international bodies and overseas Koreans' organizations and staff members of foreign embassies and missions of international bodies here.
					
					 The participants made bows to the picture of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il at the Sci-Tech Complex.
					
					 Kim Jong Suk, chairwoman of the Korean Committee for Cultural Relations with Foreign Countries who is chairwoman of the organizing committee of the book fair, in an opening address expressed the belief that the book fair would be successful thanks to the sincere efforts and positive activities of the participants. 
					
					 Victor Bogatov, head of a delegation of the Far Eastern Branch of the Russian Academy of Sciences, in a congratulatory speech expressed the will to take an active part in the Pyongyang International Science and Technology Book Fair to make contributions to boosting international exchange and cooperation of science and technology.

articles.title: Reception Given for Participants in Int'l Science and Technology Book Fair
articles.content:
Reception Given for Participants in Int'l Science and Technology Book Fair
 Pyongyang, September 26 (KCNA) -- The organizing committee of the 10th Pyongyang International Science and Technology Book Fair gave a reception at the People's Palace of Culture Monday in honor of the participants in the fair.
					 Present there on invitation were delegations and delegates of different countries, international organizations and overseas compatriots taking part in the fair and staff members of foreign embassies and missions of international organizations here.
					
					 Present there were Choe Thae Bok, vice-chairman of the C.C., the Workers' Party of Korea, Kim Jong Suk, chairwoman of the Korean Committee for Cultural Relations with Foreign Countries and chairwoman of the organizing committee of the fair, and officials concerned.

articles.title: DPRK FM Delegation Visits Vietnam
articles.content:
DPRK FM Delegation Visits Vietnam
 Pyongyang, September 26 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the Foreign Ministry of the DPRK led by Choe Hui Chol, director general of the Asian and Oceanian Department, paid an official visit to the Socialist Republic of Vietnam from September 22 to 25.
					 The delegation paid a courtesy call on Le Hoai Trung, vice-minister of Foreign Affairs of Vietnam, and met with Pham Sao Mai, director general of the Northeast Asian Department, and officials of the Department for International Bodies and the ASEAN Department to exchange opinions.
					
					 The DPRK side said that it is the consistent stand of the DPRK to steadily develop the traditional relations of friendship and cooperation between the two countries forged by the great leader of the Korean people President Kim Il Sung and the respected President of the Vietnamese people Ho Chi Minh.
					
					 It informed the Vietnamese side of the grave situation prevailing on the Korean Peninsula due to the reckless nuclear war moves of the U.S. and other hostile forces, expressing the will to invariably hold fast to the state line of nuclear weaponization and bolstering up nukes at a high level, the line chosen to defend its sovereignty and right to existence.
					
					 The Vietnamese side expressed the will to develop the friendly and cooperative relations with the DPRK despite the changing situation and boost the bilateral cooperation in the ASEAN, UN and regional and international arenas, manifesting the understanding of the efforts of the DPRK side to protect peace and stability on the Korean Peninsula.
					
					 Both sides discussed issues concerning bilateral relations and regional and international issues of mutual concern in a candid and sincere atmosphere and reached a consensus of views on them.

articles.title: DPRK Institute of International Studies Exposes U.S. Nuclear Crimes
articles.content:
DPRK Institute of International Studies Exposes U.S. Nuclear Crimes
 Pyongyang, September 26 (KCNA) -- The DPRK Institute of International Studies Monday released a memorandum exposing the nuclear crimes of the U.S.
					 It recalls that the U.S. "Manhattan Plan" and the nuclear disasters inflicted by it on Hiroshima and Nagasaki were aimed at exterminating mankind and using innocent people as guinea pigs, the memorandum noted, and went on:
					
					 The U.S. real intention of using nukes was to browbeat the progressives and bring the world to its knees by showing the destructive power of the bombs in the eyes of the world.
					
					 The U.S. made no scruple of hatching unethical plots and committing monstrous crimes for establishing an unchallenged monopoly on nukes and making our planet subject to chains of nuclear weapons in a bid to threaten the existence of mankind with nuclear sticks in every part of the world.
					
					 The U.S. deployed about 800 nukes in Okinawa, 600 in south Korea, 225 on Guam, 60 in the Philippines and 12 in Taipei, China in 1960, bringing the number of nukes to some 1,700 in total in Asia-Pacific. The number of nukes increased to 3,200 in 1967. The U.S. deployed at least 1,000 nukes in south Korea, in particular, in 1975 and more than 1,720 in 1985, according to the minutes of the "National Assembly" of south Korea in 1985.
					
					 In November 1948 Truman laid down "nuclear blackmail strategy" calling for making nuclear strike at the depth of socialist countries. But when the U.S. failed to establish monopoly on nukes, it came out with the doctrine for establishing "world domination with an unchallenged edge of strength" and put forth the "strategy for preempting the operation for containing surrounding countries," the strategy making the Soviet Union and progressive countries in its vicinity targets of attack.
					
					 The Korean War which broke out in June 1950 was the first war in which the above-said strategy was put into practice. On November 30, 1950 Truman directly gave the U.S. Strategic Flying Corps an instruction to make preparations for dropping A-bombs. In December MacArthur, commander of the U.S. forces in the Far East, brought an aircraft carrier with A-bombs aboard to the sea off Inchon.
					
					 When the U.S. defeat in the Korean War became clear, its warmongers vociferated about "large-scale retaliation strategy". In August 1953 right after the ceasefire the U.S. worked out the top-secret plan 8-53 for massively dropping nuclear bombs in the northern part of the Korean Peninsula and attempted to ignite a nuclear war.
					
					 The criminal nature of the U.S. nuclear war policy found the most vivid expression in its nuclear policy towards the DPRK.
					
					 When the DPRK-U.S. talks were kicked off, the Clinton Administration made assurance that the latter would neither use nor threaten the DPRK with armed forces including nukes but staged a series of mock nuclear attack drills targeting the DPRK at a military base in North Carolina State from January in 1998.
					
					 Bush II totally overturned the October 21, 1994, DPRK-U.S. Agreed Framework and the October 12, 2000, DPRK-U.S. joint communique and listed the DPRK as part of the "axis of evil" and a target of a preemptive nuclear attack upon it.
					
					 In the joint statement issued at the six-party talks on Sept. 19. 2005, the U.S. confirmed that there is no intent to attack or invade the DPRK with nukes or conventional weapons but at the annual security consultative meeting with south Korea in 2006 it went in the opposite direction by reiterating its plan to introduce nuclear carriers, nuclear submarines and strategic bombers and other latest nuclear war means in peace times, too.
					
					 The Obama administration excluded the DPRK from the object of non-use of nuclear weapons in the "report on nuclear posture review" in April, 2010. In the "quadrennial defense strategy review report" in March, 2014 it openly defined the DPRK as "the country posing a direct threat to it" and undisguisedly cried out for "containing it with nuclear force". 
					
					 Pursuant to this scenario, the U.S. pushed the situation on the Korean peninsula to the brink of a nuclear war through the Ulji Freedom Guardian joint military drills with the south Korean warmongers in 2015. It staged the largest-ever Key Resolve and Foal Eagle 16 in March and Ulji Freedom Guardian nuclear war drill in August this year with all type  nuclear war means involved. It recently decided to deploy THAAD in south Korea. 
					
					 As long as the U.S. exists on the earth, the world without nuclear weapons is no more than a daydream and our planet will be in peace only when it is free from its aggression. 
					
					 Thanks to Juche Korea, nuclear power of independence and justice, mankind's ideal to live independently and peacefully on our planet free from a war will surely come true.

articles.title: Floral Tribute Paid to Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Floral Tribute Paid to Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
 Pyongyang, September 26 (KCNA) -- The participants in the 10th Pyongyang International Science and Technology Book Fair visited the statues of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il on Mansu Hill Monday.
					 They laid a floral basket and bunches of flowers before the statues of the great leaders and paid tribute to them.
					
					 On the same day, a vice-governor of the Maritime Territory Administration of Russia and his party and a Lao high-ranking youth delegation paid tribute to the great leaders before their statues.

articles.title: Production of Building Materials Rapidly Increases in DPRK
articles.content:
Production of Building Materials Rapidly Increases in DPRK
 Pyongyang, September 26 (KCNA) -- Factories under the Ministry of Construction and Building-Materials in the DPRK have recently increased the production of cement, sheet glass and other building materials as much as possible to help the recovery efforts in the flood-hit northern areas of North Hamgyong Province.
					 According to data available at the ministry, the outputs of cement and sheet glass went up 1.5 and 1.1 times respectively in recent days as against the figures in the same period of last year.
					
					 The Sunchon Cement Complex supplied tens of thousands of tons of cement to the disaster areas while conducting a vigorous drive for increased production.
					
					 The Chonnaeri Cement Factory has already carried out its cement production assignment over 50 percent.
					
					 The workers at the Taean Friendship Glass Factory have produced tens of thousands of square meters of sheet glass for the flood-hit areas until now.

articles.title: Relief Activities in Various Parts of DPRK
articles.content:
Relief Activities in Various Parts of DPRK
 Pyongyang, September 26 (KCNA) -- South Hamgyong Province of the DPRK has concentrated its efforts on the supply of relief materials and power to flood-hit North Hamgyong Province, adjacent to it.
					 The Puraesan Cement Factory in the province sent several hundred tons of cement to the disaster areas by launching a vigorous drive for increased production, while the Hamhung Steel Works showed higher results in the bar steel production every day.
					
					 This month, several power stations in the province has generated electricity 1.3 times higher than August. 
					
					 Meanwhile, light industrial establishments in the province have turned out more underwear and other goods by keeping their equipment at full-capacity operation.
					
					South Hamgyong Province has already provided the disaster areas with a great deal of grains and foodstuff and more than 40,000 pieces of daily necessaries and building materials.

articles.title: National Software Exhibition of Education Field Opens
articles.content:
National Software Exhibition of Education Field Opens
 Pyongyang, September 26 (KCNA) -- The 17th National Software Exhibition of Education Field opened with due ceremony at the Three-Revolution Exhibition House Monday.
					 On display are more than 1,000 programs including programs for supporting education, remote-controlled education, simulation experiment and practice and multifunctional classroom developed by teachers, researchers and students of over 100 units including Kim Il Sung University, Kim Chaek University of Technology, Pyongyang University of Architecture and Huichon University of Technology.

articles.title: KCNA Commentary Terms U.S. Enemy of Int'l Community
articles.content:
KCNA Commentary Terms U.S. Enemy of Int'l Community
 Pyongyang, September 26 (KCNA) -- The U.S. talk about "threat from north Korea" is becoming increasingly hypocritical as the days go by. 
					 A senior fellow at the Cato Institute in the U.S. contributed an article to the U.S. magazine National Interest to the effect that north Korea clearly knows who it should target.
					
					 The article said it was an absurd assertion that the U.S. secretary of Defence termed the DPRK's nuclear test "direct threat to the whole international community" and the international community touted by the U.S. was a high-flown expression.
					
					 This is a fair comment on the U.S. sinister intention of floating the fiction about "threat" in a bid to pursue its policy of stifling the DPRK.
					
					 The U.S. above-said accusation against the DPRK is no more than a paradox.
					
					 The DPRK is a peace-loving country which has neither invaded nor threatened other countries.
					
					 The fair international community has no reason to come under the threat from the DPRK, which feels no necessity to pose a "threat" to it.
					
					 The U.S. is the sworn enemy of the Korean nation and wrecker of peace on the Korean peninsula and in other parts of the world which the DPRK should make tremble with a thousand-fold horror and with which it should settle accounts.
					
					 The U.S. has used nukes as a main means of threatening, blackmailing and invading other countries since it had access to nukes before any other country.
					
					 The U.S. has posed constant nuclear threat to the DPRK and ceaselessly blackmailed the DPRK for the last several decades since it considered nuclear stick as a mainstay for carrying out its anti-DPRK strategy. 
					
					 The DPRK had no choice but to have access to the powerful nuclear deterrent to protect the sovereignty and vital rights of the nation and the regional security from the outrageous U.S. policy of nuclear war against the DPRK.
					
					 The DPRK went through the final process for rounding off the state nuclear force after conducting the nuclear warhead explosion test, the highest phase of mounting nuclear warheads on ballistic rockets, in order to thoroughly foil the U.S. moves to stifle the former. 
					
					 The DPRK's access to nuclear weapons put a definite end to the era in which the U.S. threatened and blackmailed against the former with nukes.
					
					 The DPRK does not hide that it no longer feels any threat and panic from the U.S. but becomes the biggest threat and panic to the U.S.
					
					 As universally recognized, the U.S. is a wrecker of peace and real foe of the international community as it is still plunging the world into ceaseless wars and turbulences.
					
					 The U.S. is the target of the DPRK.
					
					 It is the firm will of the servicepersons and people of the DPRK to put a definite end to the U.S. nuclear tyranny with nukes of justice.
					
					 The U.S. had better make a wise choice of rolling back its anachronistic hostile policy towards the DPRK if it wants to escape the latter's merciless nuclear strikes.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Calls for Dynamic Autumn Campaign of Land Management
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Calls for Dynamic Autumn Campaign of Land Management
 Pyongyang, September 26 (KCNA) -- Rodong Sinmun Monday runs an editorial calling for a dynamic autumn campaign of land management.
					 The autumn campaign of land management launched every year under the far-reaching plan of the Party for land development is an all-people patriotic one which should not be neglected even a moment, the editorial says, and goes on:
					
					 It is the noble duty and the most important task for our generation to turn the country into a socialist land of bliss by successfully sprucing up by our own efforts the land of the country, eternal cradle ensuring genuine life of the people and happiness of all generations to come and precious asset and wealth for the building of a socialist power. 
					
					 A gigantic campaign is now under way out of patriotism to recover from the severe flood damage in the northern part of North Hamgyong Province and turn the afflicted areas into fairyland in the era of the Workers' Party as quickly as possible. This reality urgently requires the people to wage a more vigorous campaign for land management to turn all parts of the country into structures of lasting value free from any natural calamities.
					
					 All the people should turn out in the above-said campaign as one while directing all efforts to the drive for recovering from the flood damage in hearty response to the Party's call and conclude the 200-day campaign of loyalty with proud successes in land management campaign, concludes the editorial.

articles.title: DPRK Wins Another Victory in Confrontation with U.S.: Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
DPRK Wins Another Victory in Confrontation with U.S.: Rodong Sinmun
 Pyongyang, September 26 (KCNA) -- The DPRK succeeded in assessing the explosive power of a nuclear warhead through a single test. This helped remarkably bolster up its nuclear strike capability and made it possible to produce various type smaller, lighter and diversified nuclear warheads with much higher striking power as many as it desires. Rodong Sinmun on Monday observes this in a commentary.
					 It goes on:
					
					 In the protracted fierce confrontation between the DPRK and the U.S., the latter suffered a heavy defeat while the former achieved another great victory.
					
					 The U.S., the world's biggest nuclear power, suffered a bitter shame in the eyes of the world though it behaved recklessly, wielding a nuclear club against the DPRK.
					
					 It decisively prevailed over the U.S. in the confrontation of strength with it.
					
					 Obama is compelled to suffer the disgrace of recording another page of setbacks in the history of the U.S.
					
					 The U.S. has gone reckless in introducing its nuclear carriers and strategic nuclear bombers into south Korea and its vicinity and tightening sanctions against the DPRK but it is nothing but a bluff.
					
					 The U.S., however, should draw a lesson from the long-standing stand-off with the DPRK.
					
					 Looking back on history, the U.S. tried hard to stifle the DPRK, counting on its enormous muscle but was hit hard and sustained only setbacks in  face of the latter's counteractions.
					
					 This has become an inglorious tradition and an unavoidable result. This has become constant mental agony for Washington.
					
					 The only way out for the U.S. to get rid of this agony is to reexamine its policy towards the DPRK and make a fresh start. This alone will help the U.S. save its face as a big power. 
					
					 This is a good advice for the future U.S. politicians.

articles.title: THAAD Deployment in S. Korea Slammed
articles.content:
THAAD Deployment in S. Korea Slammed
 Pyongyang, September 26 (KCNA) -- The green parties of the U.S. and south Korea in a joint statement on Sept. 19 clarified the stand against the THAAD deployment in south Korea, according to a south Korean paper.
					 The statement noted that the THAAD deployment in south Korea is aimed to escalate tension in Northeast Asia and incite arms race and thus wreck global peace.
					
					 It declared that the parties will cooperate in joint action for the immediate retraction of the decision on THAAD deployment.

articles.title: S. Korean Regime's Repression of Workers Protested
articles.content:
S. Korean Regime's Repression of Workers Protested
 Pyongyang, September 26 (KCNA) -- In south Korea the Park Geun Hye group of traitors is now harshly putting down the people's struggle for vital rights as "illegal".
					 In this regard, workers and other citizens in the DPRK have lifted up their voice of protest against the Park group's brutal repression.
					
					 Ri Myong Il, head of a workshop at the Pyongyang Electric Cable Factory 326, told KCNA:
					
					 Many inhabitants of south Korea contend that it has turned into a hell where democracy is put down and "yusin" dictatorship in the 1970s revived under the Park Geun Hye group's fascist rule.
					
					 This is well evidenced by the fact that the puppet police mercilessly fired water cannons at an aged peasant taking part in an all-out people's action for vital rights at the end of last year, who died at last.
					
					 South Korea is tundra of human rights where a tiny handful of privileged clans trample down the dignity and rights of the majority of the working masses.
					
					 Some time ago, the policy planning official of the puppet Ministry of Education dared say that the popular masses should be treated as dogs and pigs and a labor inspector described working people as slaves.
					
					 These remarks are an intensive expression of the anti-social policies of the Park Geun Hye group treating the working masses as animals.
					
					 In south Korea, more than 40 people a day are reported to kill themselves because of difficult living conditions.
					
					 The south Korean people should turn out to immediately beat down Park Geun Hye and her group that took office with such deceptive commitments as "era of people's happiness".

articles.title: S. Korean Puppet Authorities' Moves to Incite Story about "Security Crisis" Slammed
articles.content:
S. Korean Puppet Authorities' Moves to Incite Story about "Security Crisis" Slammed
 Pyongyang, September 26 (KCNA) -- Kyunghyang Daily News of south Korea carried an editorial on Sept. 23 as regards the fact that the puppet group incited the story of "security crisis" under the pretext of the DPRK's nuclear warhead explosion test.
					 It accused the ruling party of raising the "story about nuclear weaponization" and some lawmakers from opposition parties of following it after the north's nuke test.
					
					 The story of making a preemptive nuclear attack upon the north touted by the ruling party and the U.S. is an extremely dangerous action to stir up the nation's extermination, it noted, adding that what the people want is peace, not a war. 
					
					 The "story about nuclear weaponization" raised by the ruling forces is no more than the story of "security crisis" that took the advantage of the citizens' uneasiness.

articles.title: S. Korean Peasant Paek Nam Gi Dies
articles.content:
S. Korean Peasant Paek Nam Gi Dies
Pyongyang, September 26 (KCNA) -- South Korean peasant Paek Nam Gi, who had been at the point of death after he was hit by water cannon of the fascist police during the people's all-out action on November 14 last year, died on Sunday.
					 This is the tragedy caused by the premeditated and intentional acts of the puppet group of traitors.

articles.title: News Analyst on Poor Human Rights Record of U.S.
articles.content:
News Analyst on Poor Human Rights Record of U.S.
 Pyongyang, September 26 (KCNA) -- Recently, a demonstration was launched in Charlotte City of North Carolina State, the United States, to protest the fatal police shooting at an unarmed black man in his forties.
					 In February, a policeman fired at a 16-year-old boy, wounding him in Salt Lake City, Utah State and a man made shooting against his colleagues, killing three of them and wounding 14 others in Kansas State.
					
					 According to a Romanian TV broadcasting program in January, the total number of Americans who lost their lives in the American Civil War, U.S.-Spanish War, the First and Second World Wars and many other wars in the history of the U.S. is 1.2 million while the number of those who were killed owing to gun-related crimes inside the U.S. in peace time is 1.4 million.
					
					 These figures well shows the true colors of the U.S. society as the worst human rights abuser.
					
					 In fact, it is usual in the U.S. to witness such human rights violations as racial discrimination and outrages on sex and children as well as shooting to death by the police whose duty is to protect human lives.
					
					 The U.S. has also committed heinous crimes against humanity in every part of the world.
					
					 It set up secret prisons in Guantanamo and other parts of the world to put innocent people to various sorts of torture and violence.
					
					 It is none other than the U.S. that has put the whole world under its surveillance, mercilessly violating the sovereignty of independent countries as well as elementary rights of human being.
					
					 The U.S. does not hesitate to meddle in other countries' internal affairs and then stage a military aggression on them over what is called "human rights issue", creating international disorder.
					
					 In various regions of the world, regimes were collapsed and racial dispute and civil wars broke out to cause a radically increasing number of refugees. It is an outcome of the vicious moves against humanity done by the U.S. on the plea of "protecting peace and human rights".
					
					 Nevertheless, the U.S. pulls up others over their human rights performance, styling itself a "human rights judge" of the world.
					
					 It is well advised to set right its poor human rights performance rather than acting a "human rights judge".

articles.title: DPRK's Nuclear Warhead Explosion Test Supported by Bangladeshi Body
articles.content:
DPRK's Nuclear Warhead Explosion Test Supported by Bangladeshi Body
 Pyongyang, September 26 (KCNA) -- The Bangladesh Institute of the Juche Idea released a statement on Sept. 21 supporting the nuclear warhead explosion test that demonstrated the dignity of the nuclear power of Juche.
					 The statement said:
					
					 We fully support the nuclear warhead explosion test conducted by the DPRK.
					
					 The DPRK once again fully demonstrated its tremendous national power through the test.
					
					 This is a great victory that can be achieved by the DPRK only.
					
					 The U.S. and its followers are pulling up the DPRK over the test.
					
					 If the U.S. truly hopes for peace, it should roll back its hostile policy toward the DPRK and opt for concluding a peace treaty with it.
					
					 A series of eye-opening successes witnessed in the DPRK proves that not a big country can defeat any formidable enemy if it has strong national power.

articles.title: DPRK Has High Sci-tech Potentials: Russian Body
articles.content:
DPRK Has High Sci-tech Potentials: Russian Body
 Pyongyang, September 26 (KCNA) -- The Russian Group for Solidarity with the DPRK released a statement on Sept. 20 congratulating the DPRK on its successful ground test of new type high-power engine for a carrier rocket for geo-stationary satellite.
					 The statement said:
					
					 By manufacturing a new type high-power engine in a short span of time, the DPRK led by Marshal Kim Jong Un demonstrated that it has high sci-tech potentials and undergone rapid progress in its rocket and space development.
					
					 This success achieved by the heroic Korean people despite hideous moves of the imperialists to stifle the DPRK dealt a telling blow to the U.S. and its followers.
					
					 We hope the Korean people would eradicate the aftermath of the flood damage in North Hamgyong Province and register big successes in the struggle for bolstering the defence capabilities, exploring space for peaceful purposes and bettering the people's livelihood.

articles.title: U.S. Ridiculed by Brazilian Organization
articles.content:
U.S. Ridiculed by Brazilian Organization
 Pyongyang, September 26 (KCNA) -- An article titled "Political ignoramus" was posted by the Brazilian Committee for Solidarity with the DPRK on its website on September 19.
					 The article said:
					
					 The DPRK's successful nuclear warhead explosion test proved again that the U.S. has acted a blind fool.
					
					 The U.S. has taken up an attitude of denying the DPRK's access to nuclear weapons till now.
					
					 It is the U.S. policy which squarely opposed the DPRK's strategic position as a full-fledged nuclear weapons state.
					
					 Such policy making a denial of the irrefutable reality has stirred up discontent in the U.S.
					
					 Actually the DPRK has access to nuclear weapons to cope with the U.S. nuclear threat and persistently directed big efforts to developing the nuclear force.
					
					 The DPRK possessed of H-bombs ranked itself among nuclear weapons states in this course. The successful nuclear warhead explosion test will enable the DPRK to produce as many as it requires a variety of smaller, lighter and diversified nuclear warheads of higher strike power.
					
					 This is the result of the U.S. time-worn hostile policy and anachronistic nuclear threat with denial of the DPRK's access to nuclear weapons.
					
					 As long as the U.S. negates the reality and resorts to the stifling moves against the DPRK, the latter will steadily bolster up its nuclear deterrent both qualitatively and quantitatively.
					
					 How long is the U.S. going to act a blind fool?

articles.title: DPRK Will Continue to Bolster Its Nuclear Force Both in Quality and Quantity: Brazilian Organization
articles.content:
DPRK Will Continue to Bolster Its Nuclear Force Both in Quality and Quantity: Brazilian Organization
 Pyongyang, September 26 (KCNA) -- The DPRK will continue to bolster its nuclear force both in quality and quantity in order to defend its dignity and right to existence and safeguard genuine peace vis-a-vis the increased nuclear war threat of the United States.

					 The article said:

					 Shortly ago, the DPRK succeeded in its nuclear warhead explosion test for examining and confirming the structure and specific features of movement of nuclear warhead that has been standardized to be able to be mounted on strategic ballistic rockets.
					
					 This shows that the DPRK completed its preparations for coping with a nuclear war.
					
					 The DPRK has already succeeded in its tests such as a ground jet test of high-power engine of inter-continental ballistic rocket, simulated test of atmospheric re-entry of a ballistic rocket and test-fire of strategic submarine-launched ballistic missile.
					
					 The Hwasong artillery units of the Strategic Force of the Korean People's Army successfully conducted their test-fire of ballistic rockets.
					
					 What is left to be done now is to demonstrate their might in an actual battle.

articles.title: Efectuada reunion nacional de activistas del sector de prospeccion geologica
articles.content:
Efectuada reunion nacional de activistas del sector de prospeccion geologica
Pyongyang, 26 de septiembre (ACNC) -- Tuvo lugar la vispera en el capitalino Palacio Cultural del Pueblo la reunion nacional de activistas del sector de prospeccion geologica. 
					El conclave analizo e hizo balance de los exitos, experiencias y lecciones adquiridos en la materializacion de las tareas combativas presentadas en la obra del Dirigente Kim Jong Il "Registremos un nuevo cambio en la labor de prospeccion geologica". Y discutio los problemas para materializar a cabalidad los lineamientos estrategicos de la construccion de potencia economica presentados por el VII Congreso del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y las tareas que les incumben a los funcionarios de la rama de prospeccion geologica para cumplir con su mision y deber como explorador de la industria y vanguardia que allana el camino de construccion de la economia socialista. 
					
					Asistieron a la ocasion Pak Pong Ju, O Su Yong, Choe Pu Il, Ro Tu Chol, No Kwang Chol, los vicepremieres, los cuadros directivos de los organismos del partido, las fuerzas armadas y el poder, ministerios, organos centrales, las instituciones provinciales, urbanas y distritales, organismos, fabricas y empresas, los funcionarios y exploradores ejemplares de la rama. 
					
					Pak Pong Ju, miembro del Presidium del Buro Politico del Comite Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y primer ministro de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, dio lectura al mensaje del Presidente Kim Jong Un enviado a los participantes en la reunion "Aceleremos la construccion de potencia economica socialista registrando un viraje en la labor de prospeccion geologica". 
					
					En la misiva, el Presidente Kim Jong Un recordo que bajo la profunda atencion y energica orientacion de los grandes Lideres Kim Il Sung y Kim Jong Il, se ha alcanzado gran avance en la prospeccion geologica. 
					
					Insistio en registrar un viraje en esta labor para alcanzar las ambiciosas metas de la construccion de potencia economica socialista, presentadas por el VII Congreso del PTC, apuntando que ella es sector de patrulla de la misma empresa. 
					
					E indico las tareas para lograr un cambio decisivo en la prospeccion geologica:
					
					Hay que establecer de modo cientifico y con amplia vision del futuro la estrategia para el desarrollo de la prospeccion geologica conforme a la demanda de la construccion de potencia economica y cumplirla sin falta por etapas. 
					
					Es necesario realizar la modernizacion y la informatizacion de la prospeccion geologica a base de las ciencias y tecnicas ultramodernas y modernizar y fabricar con recursos nacionales los equipos de prospeccion. 
					
					Hace falta establecer la disciplina y el orden de desarrollar los recursos subterraneos bajo el control unificado del Estado, elevar la responsabilidad y papel de los organos de proteccion y supervision de recursos naturales y prestar la atencion estatal al abastecimiento material y tecnico sobre la rama. 
					
					Kim Jong Un manifesto la confianza de que los funcionarios y trabajadores de la rama de todo el pais contribuiran a la construccion de potencia economica socialista al registrar viraje en la prospeccion geologica. 
					
					Al presentar el informe de la ocasion, el vicepremier Ri Ryong Nam recordo que en su discurso "Para priorizar decisivamente la prospeccion geologica", pronunciado el 15 de mayo del 50 (1961) de la Era Juche en la reunion consultiva nacional de los funcionarios de la rama, el Presidente Kim Il Sung presento los problemas de principios y las tareas que se presentaban en la prospeccion geologica, y los remedios para cumplirlos. 
					
					Continuo que el Dirigente Kim Jong Il hizo convocar el 25 de mayo del 80 (1991) de la Era Juche la reunion nacional de los funcionarios de la rama de prospeccion geologica y envio a los participantes el mensaje "Registremos un nuevo cambio en la labor de prospeccion geologica".
					
					Enfatizo que la idea y causa de los grandes Lideres en materia de la prospeccion geologica continuan por el Presidente Kim Jong Un. 
					
					Apunto que en acato a las tareas presentadas en el mensaje enviado por el Presidente, se debe establecer los objetivos perspectivos, las tareas por etapas y las medidas para su cumplimiento, a base de la estrategia estatal de desarrollo economico presentada por el Partido, y materializarlos estrictamente movilizando al maximo las bases existentes y todas las potencialidades. 
					
					Los oradores manifestaron la decision de cumplir satisfactoriamente su mision de patrulla de la industria al buscar todos los recursos subterraneos del pais registrando nuevo cambio en la prospeccion geologica y glorificar en todo el mundo la era del gran Partido del Trabajo que brilla con creaciones y cambios.

articles.title: Tiene lugar el Festival Aereo de Wonsan-2016
articles.content:
Tiene lugar el Festival Aereo de Wonsan-2016
Pyongyang, 26 de septiembre (ACNC) -- Tuvo lugar el Festival Aereo de Wonsan-2016 en la ciudad de Wonsan de la provincia de Kangwon.
					Durante el evento, se efectuaron diversos actos deportivos y culturales como la demostracion de pilotaje de los aviones militares y civiles, el paracaidismo de deportistas y aficionados nacionales y extranjeros, el manejo de aeromodelos, el vuelo de excursion y la funcion conjunta de musica y danza.
					
					La ceremonia inaugural tuvo lugar el dia 24 en el Aeropuerto de Kalma.
					
					Antes de la ceremonia, los participantes rindieron homenaje al Presidente Kim Il Sung y al Dirigente Kim Jong Il luego de depositar un cesto de flores ante sus estatuas de bronce levantadas en la ciudad de Wonsan.
					
					En la ocasion tomaron parte el primer vicepresidente Yun Yong Sok y otros miembros del comite preparatorio del festival, los aficionados a los deportes aereos, los trabajadores de Wonsan, David Thomson Rolands, director de la Agencia de Viajes Juche de Gran Bretana y vicepresidente honorario del comite preparatorio, los representantes diplomaticos, los miembros de las embajadas en Corea y los huespedes extranjeros.
					
					Hubo discursos.
					
					Terminada la inauguracion, comenzaron los vuelos diestros de aviones militares y civiles.
					
					Los pilotos de cazas del Ejercito Popular de Corea cumplieron perfectamente los movimientos de gran habilidad como el vuelo horizontal y los de ascenso y descenso y a ras de la tierra, etc.
					
					La demostracion de pilotos militares llego al climax con la presencia de las aviadoras de cazas supersonicos.
					
					Los espectadores felicitaron con fuertes aplausos a los pilotos cada vez que estos mostraban sus habilidades especiales aterrizando y despegando diestramente.
					
					Demostraron plenamente sus habilidades tambien los pilotos de aviones civiles que pusieron muy alegres a los espectadores.
					
					Por la noche del dia 24, hubo la funcion conjunta de musica y danza en el Anfiteatro de la Juventud de Songdowon. 
					
					El dia 25, tuvieron lugar el paracaidismo de jugadores y aficionados nacionales y extranjeros y el control de aeromodelos y otras actividades que fomentaron el clima del festival.
					
					Ese dia, se realizo la velada de jovenes y estudiantes para felicitar la exitosa conclusion del festival en la Plaza Haean de la ciudad de Wonsan.

articles.title: Inaugurada X exposicion internacional de libros de ciencias y tecnicas de Pyongyang.
articles.content:
Inaugurada X exposicion internacional de libros de ciencias y tecnicas de Pyongyang.
Pyongyang, 26 de septiembre (ACNC) -- Quedo inaugurada la X Exposicion Internacional de Libros de Ciencias y Tecnicas de Pyongyang.
					En la ocasion se exhiben los libros y datos de ciencia y tecnica ultramodernas, presentados por decenas de entidades de mas de 20 paises, inclusive la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, Alemania, Rusia, Singapur, Egipto, Vietnam, Finlandia, el Peru, China y las organizaciones internacionales como UNESCO, OMS, el Proyecto Mediatico de Educacion Medioambiental, las entidades de los coreanos residentes en ultramar, las personalidades y las embajadas de varios paises y las representaciones de organizaciones internacionales, acreditadas en Corea.
					
					Tuvo lugar el dia 26 en el Palacio de Ciencias y Tecnicas la ceremonia inaugural.
					
					Asistieron a la ocasion el vicepresidente del Comite Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Choe Thae Bok, y otros funcionarios interesados, los profesores, investigadores, las delegaciones y delegados de varios paises y organizaciones internacionales y de los compatriotas residentes en ultramar y los miembros de las embajadas de varios paises y las representaciones de organizaciones internacionales, acreditadas en la RPDC.
					
					Ante todo, los participantes rindieron homenaje al Presidente Kim Il Sung y al Dirigente Kim Jong Il ante la pintura con sus imagenes colocada en el Palacio.
					
					En su discurso de apertura, Kim Jong Suk, presidenta del Comite de Relaciones Culturales con el Extranjero y del comite organizador de la exposicion, expreso la conviccion de que la feria se realizara con exito gracias a los esfuerzos sinceros y las actividades energicas de los participantes.
					
					Victor Bogatov, jefe de la delegacion de la filial de la Academia de Ciencias de Rusia en el Lejano Oriente, expreso en su discurso de felicitacion la decision de hacer aporte a ampliar y desarrollar el intercambio y cooperacion internacionales en el dominio cientifico-tecnico al participar activamente en la feria.

articles.title: Delegacion de MINREX realiza visita a Vietnam
articles.content:
Delegacion de MINREX realiza visita a Vietnam 
Pyongyang, 26 de septiembre (ACNC) -- La delegacion del Ministerio de Relaciones Exteriores de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, encabezada por el director de Asia y Oceania, Choe Hui Chol, cumplio desde el dia 22 al 25 una visita oficial a la Republica Socialista de Vietnam. 
					En este periodo, la delegacion realizo una visita de cortesia al vicecanciller vietnamita Le Hoai Trung e intercambio las opiniones con el director del Nordeste Asiatico y los funcionarios de las Direcciones de Organizaciones Internacionales y ASEAN. 
					
					La parte coreana enfatizo que la RPDC tiene la invariable posicion de consolidar y desarrollar constantemente las tradicionales relaciones de amistad y cooperacion entre los dos paises, preparadas por el Lider del pueblo coreano Kim Il Sung y el estimado Presidente del pueblo vietnamita Ho Chi Minh. 
					
					Informo la grave situacion creada en la Peninsula Coreana debido a las imprudentes maniobras de guerra nuclear de EE.UU. y otras fuerzas hostiles y expuso la decision de impulsar invariablemente el armamento nuclear y la elevacion de su nivel, linea estatal optada para defender la soberania y el derecho a la subsistencia. 
					
					La parte vietnamita manifesto la posicion de desarrollar las relaciones de amistad y cooperacion con la RPDC independientemente del cambio de la situacion y fortalecer aun mas la cooperacion bilateral en la ASEAN, la ONU y otros escenarios regionales e internacionales y expreso el entendimiento sobre los esfuerzos de la parte coreana por defender la paz y la estabilidad de la Peninsula Coreana. 
					
					Ambas partes discutieron en un ambiente franco y sincero el problema de relaciones bilaterales y los otros regionales e internacionales de interes mutuo y llegaron al consenso.

articles.title: IEAI publica memorando para denunciar crimenes nucleares de EE.UU.
articles.content:
IEAI publica memorando para denunciar crimenes nucleares de EE.UU.
Pyongyang, 26 de septiembre (ACNC) -- El Instituto de Estudio de los Asuntos Internacionales (IEAI) de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea hizo publico el dia 26 un memorando para revelar los crimenes nucleares de los Estados Unidos que mancharon con sangre la historia de la humanidad. 
					Segun el documento, el "plan de Manhattan" y el holocausto nuclear de Hiroshima y Nagasaki fueron inventados por EE.UU. tomando como premisa el exterminio de la humanidad y se llevaron a efecto a manera de experimento con seres vivos. 
					
					Los belicistas norteamericanos establecieron el comite consultivo de uranio en septiembre de 1939 y analizaron en detalles las posibilidades de desarrollo y uso de la bomba de fision nuclear. A base de ello, organizaron la comision suprema politico-militar en noviembre de 1941 para tener el arma nuclear antes que la Alemania fascista a fin de exterminar la humanidad.
					
					En agosto de 1942, se instituyo una zona especial para el desarrollo de armas nucleares en Los Alamos del Estado de Nuevo Mexico, de modo que se pusiera en practica el "plan de Manhattan".
					
					Desoyendo la opinion de los cientificos de que la bomba nuclear de uranio debe pasar la prueba de explosion, EE.UU. la lanzo primero sobre Hiroshima el 6 de agosto de 1945.
					
					Tres dias despues, volvio a tirar la bomba nuclear de plutonio sobre Nagasaki. 
					
					La verdadera intencion de EE.UU. fue demostrar con hechos el poder destructivo de esas armas diabolicas para intimidar a las fuerzas progresistas y doblegar a todo el mundo. 
					
					Para monopolizar las armas nucleares y tomar la supremacia absoluta, EE.UU. no vacila en cometer los complots y fechorias de lesa humanidad y amenaza gravemente la existencia de la humanidad esgrimiendo a sus caprichos el garrote nuclear por doquier de nuestro planeta. 
					
					„ÄÄDespues de la primera prueba nuclear realizada en 1945 hasta finales de diciembre de 1994, EE.UU. perpetro las pruebas nucleares en mil 32 ocasiones (segun el numero de agosto de 1995 de la revista australiana Estudios del Pacifico) y hasta el ano 1967, aumento a mas de 32 mil 500 el numero de armas nucleares. 
					
					A eso de 1960, tenia mil 700 armas nucleares, aproximadamente, en la region de Asia-Pacifico, especificamente, alrededor de 800 en Okinawa, 600 en el Sur de Corea, 225 en la isla Guam, 60 en Filipinas y 12 en Taiwan de China. Y en el ano 1967, su numero crecio a 3 mil 200. En particular, hasta el ano 1975, se emplazaron en el Sur de Corea mas de mil armas nucleares (de acuerdo con las declaraciones hechas en mayo de 1975 por el representante Ronald Dellums ante el Congreso norteamericano), y en 1985, esa cifra se incremento a mas de mil 720 (el acta de reunion de la "Asamblea Nacional" del Sur de Corea sesionada en 1985). 
					
					Truman, quien presento en noviembre de 1948 la "estrategia de chantaje nuclear" consistente en atacar con armas nucleares las profundidades de los paises socialistas, amplio su doctrina como la de "dominar el mundo con la supremacia absoluta de las fuerzas" cuando se ha roto su monopolio nuclear.
					
					Ademas, planteo la "estrategia de disuasivo previo del contorno" que incluye en la lista de blancos de ataque a la Union Sovietica y hasta los paises progresistas circunvecinos.
					
					El primer paso de cumplimiento de esa estrategia fue la guerra de agresion a Corea, estallada en junio de 1950. 
					
					El 30 de noviembre de 1950, Truman dio personalmente a la aviacion estrategica norteamericana la orden de preparar el lanzamiento de bomba nuclear y en diciembre, el comandante de las fuerzas norteamericanas en el Extremo Oriente MacArthur introdujo en el mar frente a Inchon el portaaviones cargado de armas nucleares.
					
					Al planear el lanzamiento de gran cantidad de sustancias radiactivas, inclusive plutonio y residuos nucleares, en el medio de la Peninsula Coreana (segun "Guerra radiactiva", informe del Buro Federal de Investigacion de EE.UU. fechado 20 de abril de 1951), realizo hasta 1952 en 65 ocasiones los ejercicios en campana. 
					
					Eisenhower firmo en diciembre de 1952 la operacion de "nueva ofensiva", que preve la movilizacion de medios nucleares en el frente coreano, y declaro abiertamente en enero de 1953 que "no repararia en el uso de bomba nuclear", de modo que sumaran cientos de miles de "refugiados de bomba atomica".
					
					Cuando se hizo evidente su derrota en la guerra coreana, los belicistas estadounidenses insistieron en la "estrategia de represalia masiva".
					
					En agosto de 1953, poco despues del cese de fuego, elaboraron el plan de operacion supersecreta "8-53" de lanzar gran cantidad de bombas nucleares en la parte septentrional de la Peninsula Coreana.
					
					Desde 1954 hasta finales de la decada de 1950, desplegaron 143 mil 500 efectivos agresores en la region de Asia-Pacifico, 313 mil en Europa Occidental, 40 mil en la sexta flota norteamericana, o sea, cerca de medio millon en total, para ejercer la amenaza nuclear contra los Estados soberanos.
					
					El "plan operativo integral y unido (SIOP) 62" de EE.UU., puesto en marcha en abril de 1961, fue el plan de guerra nuclear total que preve golpear con 3 mil 200 armas nucleares mil 60 blancos definidos en los paises socialistas y repetir el ataque con mil 706 artefactos nucleares contra 725 objetivos en el caso de contraataque.
					
					La "estrategia de reaccion flexible", inventada en febrero de 1962 por el secretario de Defensa McNamara, el presidente de la Junta de Jefes de Estado Mayor, Taylor, y otros, fue la doctrina mas cruel de las administraciones de Kennedy y Johnson que exigen "la preparacion flexible" tanto para la guerra nuclear total como para la guerra local y la especial.
					
					Mas tarde, la politica de garrote nuclear se hizo mas amplia y profunda mediante la "estrategia de detencion realista" de Nixon, la "de ataque preventivo nuclear" de Carter, el plan de la "Guerra de las Galaxias" (proyecto de defensa estrategica) y la "estrategia de enfrentamiento directo" de Reagan. 
					
					Despues del fin de la Guerra Fria, EE.UU. presento la "estrategia win-win" que planea triunfar al mismo tiempo en las dos guerras y elevo mas el grado de amenaza y chantaje nucleares provocando al fin y al cabo la Guerra del Golfo Persico y la de ex Yugoslavia. Con motivo del incidente del 11 de Septiembre de 2001, presento la nueva doctrina de la llamada "guerra antiterrorista" y cometio las invasiones armadas contra Afganistan, Irak y Libia.
					
					En los ultimos anos, los belicistas nucleares yanquis renuevan incesantemente los misiles balisticos intercontinentales, los submarinos nucleares y los bombarderos estrategicos nucleares, tres componentes de las fuerzas armadas estrategicas, y, por otra parte, aceleran el desarrollo de las 5 ojivas nucleares de nuevo tipo, incluyendo la bomba "B61-12", y las armas nucleares de cuarta generacion, asi como los bombarderos ultrasonicos sin piloto "X-51A"y "X-43A" capaces de cargar ojiva nuclear.
					
					El memorando revelo las fechorias que cometieron los sucesivos politicastros norteamericanos enganando a la humanidad con consignas vistosas como el "uso nuclear con fines pacificos", el "desarme nuclear", la "no proliferacion nuclear" y el "mundo sin armas nucleares".
					
					La naturaleza criminal de EE.UU. se demuestra de manera mas coherente en su politica nuclear hacia la RPDC.
					
					Cuando se abrieron por primera vez las conversaciones RPDC-EE.UU., la administracion Clinton prometio a la RPDC "no usar ni amenazar con las fuerzas armadas incluyendo las nucleares" (Declaracion Conjunta RPDC-EE.UU. aprobada el 11 de junio de 1993). Pero, desarrollo en varias ocasiones desde enero de 1998 el simulacro de ataque nuclear contra la RPDC en una base militar de Carolina del Norte.
					
					Bush II revoco el Acuerdo Basico RPDC-EE.UU. firmado el 21 de octubre de 1994 y el comunicado conjunto RPDC-EE.UU. aprobado el 12 de octubre de 2000 y definio a la RPDC del "eje del mal" y blanco de ataque preventivo nuclear (su mensaje del Ano Nuevo pronunciado el 30 de enero de 2002 y en el reporte de revision de disposicion nuclear publicado en marzo de 2002).
					
					En la declaracion conjunta publicada el 19 de septiembre de 2005 en las conversaciones a 6 bandas, EE.UU. afirmo que su pais "no tiene la voluntad de atacar o agredir a la RPDC con las armas nucleares o las convencionales". Pero, actuo en contra de sus palabras, al reafirmar en la reunion consultiva anual de seguridad con el Sur de Corea convocada en 2006 la decision de introducir en el tiempo ordinario tambien los portaaviones nucleares, submarinos nucleares, bombarderos estrategicos y otros pertrechos ultramodernos de guerra nuclear. 
					
					En el "reporte de revision de la disposicion nuclear" publicado en abril de 2010, la administracion Obama excluyo a la RPDC de la lista de blancos de no uso de armas nucleares. Y en marzo de 2014, definio a la RPDC como "Estado directamente amenazante" en el "informe de revision de estrategia cuatrienal de defensa nacional" y declaro abiertamente el "aplastamiento con armas nucleares". 
					
					Segun ello, en 2015, llevo al borde de guerra nuclear la situacion de la Peninsula Coreana librando junto con los belicistas surcoreanos los ejercicios conjuntos Ulji Freedom Guardian. Y al desplegar en marzo de este ano, los simulacros de mayor envergadura Key Resolve y Foal Eagle 16, y desde agosto, la otra version de Ulji Freedom Guardian movilizando todos los medios de guerra nuclear. Y recientemente, decidio emplazar el sistema antimisiles THAAD en el suelo surcoreano. 
					
					Mientras exista EE.UU., el mundo sin armas nucleares no pasa de ser un sueno. Nuestro planeta podra vivir en paz cuando desaparezca el imperio norteamericano.
